Page 18
Road Transport Legislation Amendment (Post-Crash Drug and Alcohol Testing) Bill 2025 [NSW]
Schedule 2   Consequential amendments of other legislation
2.7
Road Transport (Vehicle Registration) Regulation 2017
[1]
Clause 46 Suspension of registration for dimension requirement offence
Omit “an accident” from clause 46(1)(b)(ii).
Insert instead “a crash”.
[2]
Schedule 2 Light Vehicle Standards Rules
Omit “for accidents” from Part 4, note. Insert instead “for crashes”.
